nodes.text: Peter Allen David (born September 23, 1956) is an American writer, who wrote "Skippy the Jedi Droid". He is best known for his work in comic books and Star Trek novels and often jokingly describes his occupation as "Writer of Stuff". David's work for Dark Horse Comics has included the teen spy adventure SpyBoy and Star Wars Tales story "Skippy the Jedi Droid."
